attributes.action: Understand that Nuclear Power is NOT Carbon Neutral
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Proponents of nuclear power always say that one of the big benefits of nuclear power is that it produces no Carbon dioxide (CO2).  This is completely untrue!

For low quality ores (less than 0.02% of U3O8 per tonne of ore), the CO2 produced by the full nuclear life cycle is EQUAL TO that produced by the equivalent gas-fired power station.

rejection.details: Please re-submit without the block caps.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
